issue.title: [C++] Developer instruction document for MSVC on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-735](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-735). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need a development document explaining how to setup the environment, build Arrow, and run its C++ unit tests

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-735?focusedCommentId=15959392) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Included in patch https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/500

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-735?focusedCommentId=15959571) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved by PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/e371ebd7e16e5e5f4b14f0f578049d9246714e77
